name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.6.0: Command visibility modes (leader/micro-manager/extra) reduce autocomplete clutter 75% while maintaining full functionality. v3.5.0: 5th core workflow (modify). v3.4.0: Confidence-based auto-execution.
